definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 12:2 nation, people (NH id. Gentiles, Ph. [[גו]] community, gawo0, Sab. [[גו]] id., DHM:ZMG 1883, 348)—´[[ג]] Ge 12:2 + 121 t.; sf. 1 S. [[גּוֹיִ]] Zep 2:9, [[גּוֹיֶ֑ךָ]] Ps 106:5, [[גּוֹיֵךְ]] Kt Ez Eze 36:13, Eze 36:14, Eze 36:15 (Qr wrongly [[גּוֹיַיִךְ]] cf. Co, who del. v:Eze 36:15); pl. [[גּוֹיִם]] Ge 10:5 + 410 t. + Qr Ge 25:23, Ps 79:10 (Kt [[גיים]]) + 6 t. Ez (var. emend. Co); cstr. [[גּוֹיֵי]] Ge 18:18 + 8 t., [[גּוֹיֵ]] 2Ch 32:13, Ezr 6:21 (cf. Baer's notes); sf. [[גּוֹיֵהֶם]] Ge 10:5, Ge 10:20, Ge 10:31, Ge 10:32; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: specif. of descendants of Abraham, [[גּוֹי גׇּדוֹל]] Ge 12:2 cf. Ge 18:18 (both J), [[גּוֹיִם]] Ge 17:6, [[הֲמוֹן]] [[גּוֹיִם]] Ge 17:4, Ge 17:15 (all P); of Sarah [[גּוֹיִם]] Ge 17:16 (P); of Ishmael [[גּוֹי]] Ge 21:13, [[גׇּוֹי גׇּדוֹל]] v:Ge 21:18 (both E), [[גּוֹי גׇּדוֹל]] Ge 17:20 (P); of Jacob [[גּוֹי וּקְהַל גּוֹיִם]] Ge 35:11 (P), [[גּוֹי]] [[גׇּדוֹל]] Ge 46:3 (E); of Ephraim ´[[מְלאׁ הַגּ]] Ge 48:19 (J); of Moses [[גּוֹי גׇּדוֹל]] Ex 32:10 (J) cf. Nu 14:12 (J) De 9:14; of Jacob and Esau as two nations Ge 25:23 (J).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: definitely of Israel Ex 19:6 ([[קָדוֹשׁ]] ´[[גּ]]) Ex 33:13 (both JE), De 4:6 ([[הַגּוֹי הַגׇּדוֹל הַזֶּה]], said by heathen cf. v:De 4:7, v:De 4:8) v. also v:De 4:34, De 26:5 cf. Ps 33:12, Ps 83:5 (said by enemies) Je 31:36, Je 33:24, Ez Eze 37:22; in narrative Jos 3:17, Jos 4:1, Jos 5:8 (JE), v:Jos 5:6 (D), Jos 10:13 (poet., no art.); of Israel and Judah as two nations Ez Eze 35:10 (said by heathen) Eze 37:22; of Judah Is 26:2, Is 26:15, Is 26:15 cf. Is 58:2, Is 60:22, Mic 4:7; once my people Zep 2:9 (‖[[עַם]]); thy people Ps 106:5 (i.e. of ´[[י]]), cf. also Ez Eze 36:13, Eze 36:14 (rd. Kt); esp. of Israel and (or) Judah as sinful, rebellious De 32:28, Ju Jdg 2:20, Is 1:4, Is 10:6, Je 5:9, Je 5:29, Je 7:28, Je 9:8, Je 12:17, Ez Eze 2:3 (del. LXX Co) Hag 2:14, Mal 3:9.—Note. This definite ref. to Israel and (or) Judah is comparatively rare; in Hex not P (yet v. Ge 17:4, Ge 17:5, Ge 17:6, Ge 17:16, Ge 35:11 P); seldom in exil. & post-exil. proph.; not Chr.—

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: usually of non-Heb. peoples Ex 9:24, Ex 34:10 (JE) Le 25:44 (H) Nu 14:15 (J) De 15:6, De 15:6, 1Ki 5:11, 1Ch 14:17, 1Ch 16:20, Is 11:10, Is 11:12 + oft.; opp. Israel as ´[[עם י]] 2Sa 7:23, 1Ch 17:21, 1Ch 17:21 etc., v. [[עם]], cf. also Nu 23:9; note esp. [[גְּלִיל הַגּוֹיִם]] Is 8:23 circle or district of the nations (v. [[גׇּלִיל]]); also ´[[חֲרשֶׁת הַגּ]] Ju Jdg 4:2, Jdg 4:13, Jdg 4:16 Charosheth of the nations, & [[מֶלֶךְ גּוֹיִם לְגִלְגׇּâל]] Jos 12:23 king of nations (peoples, tribes) belonging to Gilgal (LXX Di to the district, i.e ‘Galilee’); esp. of these peoples as heathen: idolatrous Le 8:24, Le 8:28 (P) Le 20:23 (H) 1Ki 14:24, 2Ki 17:8, 2Ki 17:11, 2Ki 17:15, 2Ki 17:26, 2Ki 17:29, 2Ki 17:29, 2Ch 28:3, 2Ch 32:13 +, Ezr 6:21, Ez Eze 5:6 +; hostile Ge 15:14 (J) Le 26:33, Le 26:38, Le 26:45 (H) De 4:27, De 9:4, De 9:5, De 18:9, 1Ch 16:35, Je 5:15, Ez Eze 4:13 + oft. Je Ez, etc.; in simile Ez Eze 20:32, Eze 25:8; sometimes ‖[[עַם]] Ps 33:10, Ps 33:12, Is 11:10, Je 6:18, v. also Is 2:2, Is 2:4 comp. with Mic 4:1, Mic 4:3.
fig. of swarm of locusts Joe 1:6; of all species of beasts Zep 2:14.
[[גּוֹיִם]] Ge 14:1, Ge 14:9 prob. mutilated n.pr. v. infr.
